concept_data.title: Union of Industrial and Employer's Confederations of Europe

summary: The "Union of Industrial and Employer's Confederations of Europe," commonly referred to as "BusinessEurope," is a prominent non-governmental organisation representing the interests of European businesses at the EU level. It plays a crucial role in shaping regulatory frameworks by advocating for policies that promote competitiveness and sustainable economic growth. BusinessEurope engages with EU institutions to influence legislation affecting industries and employers, ensuring that the voice of the business community is heard in the regulatory process. As a key stakeholder, it contributes to discussions on various economic and social issues, thereby facilitating dialogue between the private sector and policymakers.
